Courses.title: HTML for Beginners
Courses.description: Master HTML in 30 days: build 5 real-world web page projects from scratch using modern HTML5 standards, semantic tags, forms, media elements, and best practices.

Courses.title: CSS Advanced Techniques
Courses.description: Master CSS in 30 days: create responsive, dynamic layouts and advanced designs using Flexbox, Grid, animations, transitions, and Sass for real-world projects.

Courses.title: JavaScript for Intermediate Developers
Courses.description: Master JavaScript in 30 days: build 8 real-world interactive web applications using ES6+, DOM manipulation, APIs, and asynchronous programming techniques.

Courses.title: Python for Beginners
Courses.description: Master Python in 30 days: complete 7 hands-on projects including data processing, automation scripts, and simple web apps while learning Python basics and best practices.

Courses.title: Advanced Web Development
Courses.description: Master full-stack web development in 30 days: build 8 professional web applications with modern front-end and back-end technologies including React, Node.js, Express, and databases.

Courses.title: Java Programming Advanced
Courses.description: Master Java in 30 days: build 8 real-world projects covering object-oriented programming, multithreading, data structures, and performance optimization techniques.

Courses.title: PHP for Beginners
Courses.description: Master PHP in 30 days: develop 7 dynamic web projects with database integration, forms, session handling, and real-world server-side applications.

Courses.title: Python Developer Advanced
Courses.description: Master advanced Python in 30 days: complete 8 projects involving backend development, APIs, automation, and modern Python libraries for real-world applications.

Courses.title: Node.js Full-Stack Course
Courses.description: Master full-stack development with Node.js in 30 days: build 8 scalable, real-world applications using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and modern JavaScript frameworks.

Courses.title: CSS & Sass Advanced
Courses.description: Master advanced CSS and Sass in 30 days: build 7 responsive websites with animations, transitions, themes, and scalable design systems for real projects.

Courses.title: CCNA for Beginners
Courses.description: Master networking in 30 days: complete 7 practical projects and labs covering Cisco CCNA concepts, routing, switching, subnetting, and network troubleshooting.

Courses.title: UI/UX Design for Beginners
Courses.description: Master UI/UX design in 30 days: complete 8 real-world design projects covering user research, wireframing, prototyping, and creating user-friendly digital experiences.

Courses.title: Advanced Motion Design
Courses.description: Master motion design in 30 days: create 7 real-world animation projects using professional tools, motion graphics principles, and interactive UI animations for web and apps.
